title: Redragon M655 Ergonomic Wireless Gaming Mouse, Red LED Backlit with 7 Buttons Macro Programmable 4000 DPI for Windows PC Gamer
features: Wireless Gaming Mouse; Cordless Ergonomic Red LED Backlit Gaming Mouse. Up to 4000 DPI (user adjustable (1000/1500/2000/2400/4000), 15G acceleration. The High-Precision Sensor delivers Pinpoint Accuracy

LED Backlit Macro Programmable PC Gaming Mouse; 7 user programmable buttons, 5 Memory Profiles. Red LED Backlight. (Backlight can be disabled) The wireless Gaming Mouse offers you total personalization for your PC and Laptop
The ergonomic design of the Computer Gaming Mouse fits naturally in your hand, reduces stress while delivering superior productivity and efficiency
The wireless highly portable mouse has a built-in storage compartment to securely store the Plug and Play Nano USB receiver
PC Gaming Mouse Compatibility: Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7, Windows Vista, or Windows XP, Limited Mac OS support
description: Redragon 2.4GHz Ergonomic Wireless 7-Button Programmable Gaming Mouse with up to 4000 DPIA Wireless Gaming Mouse That's Built to Last and to put you in Control * 7-button programmable gaming mouse* Ergonomic Design supportive shape to reduce fatigue* Quick-change DPI settings (1000/1500/2000/2400/4000* Advanced gaming sensor for accurate gaming performance* Long battery life with low battery LED indicator **(2 AA batteries not included)* Highly Portable delivering clutter-free gaming without the cables* Nano 500Hz USB receiver with integrated storage port in the mouse* Lag-free ultra-fast 2.4GHz wireless technology* Windows 10, Windows 8, Windows 7, Windows Vista, or Windows XP, Mac* Supports Plug & Play plus additional software download, available at RedragonUSA websiteWhat's in the box* Mouse* Wireless nano receiver* User guide
